item.name: Tommy Hilfiger Wind Jacket
item.description: Stay ahead of the elements with this vibrant Tommy Hilfiger wind jacket. Designed in bold red and navy with white accents, itâ€™s as functional as it is stylish. Perfect for EUR S/M sizes, this USA XS jacket is ideal for windy weather while keeping your outfit on point.

item.name: Quechua Wind Jacket
item.description: Adventure-ready, this Quechua wind jacket in sleek black is made for performance and durability. This jacket is perfect for outdoor activities or everyday wear.

item.name: Zara Rain Jacket
item.description: Face rainy days in style with this Zara rain jacket, featuring a practical hood and double-button detailing for a timeless look. Perfectly tailored for size EUR M, this piece ensures you stay dry without compromising your fashion. Ideal for both casual outings and functional wear.

item.name: Zara Wool/Blend Shirt Jacket
item.description: Effortless style meets functionality with this Zara wool-blend shirt jacket. Made with 48% wool, 47% polyester, and 5% other fibers, this piece features a structured design and a versatile pocket detail, perfect for layering on cooler days.

item.name: Zara Beige Flannel Winter Jacket
item.description: Stay warm and stylish with this sand-colored flannel winter jacket by Zara. The minimalist design with dual chest pockets and button-down detailing offers a classic touch. This M(EUR) sized jacket is a must-have for layering in colder months.

item.name: Parajumpers Jacket
item.description: Embrace ultimate winter protection with this premium PARAJUMPERS jacket. Combining functionality and luxury, it features a fur-lined hood and robust design for extreme weather conditions.

item.name: North Face Jacket/Sweater
item.description: Stay warm and stylish with the versatile North Face jacket/sweater. Made from high-quality fleece, it is perfect for layering or as a standalone piece.

item.name: Radical 1982 Jacquard Graphic Sweater
item.description: Make a bold statement with this knit wool and silk-blend sweater from Radical 1982. Featuring a stunning jacquard graphic pattern throughout, rib-knit finishes, and dropped shoulders, this masterpiece is a true work of art. Crafted with 50% wool, 25% silk, and 25% polyamide, it combines luxury with edgy design.

item.name: Beverly Hills Polo Club Sweater
item.description: Elevate your casual style with this Beverly Hills Polo Club sweater. Crafted in navy blue, it features an embroidered American flag design and ribbed red-and-white accents. Perfect for layering or standalone wear, combining comfort and timeless charm.

item.name: Navy Blue Half-Zip Sweatshirt
item.description: Stay classy and cozy with this navy blue half-zip sweatshirt featuring the signature embroidered Rigby Go logo. Designed for a regular fit, this 100% cotton piece is perfect for casual outings or layering up on cooler days. It's the ultimate mix of style and comfort.

item.name: Pull&Bear Graphic Hoodie
item.description: Express your creativity with this Pull and Bear hoodie featuring unique graphic details and "Made of Dreams" typography. Crafted from a comfortable 70% cotton and 30% polyester blend, with secondary fabric elements.

item.name: Black Zara Viscose Sweater
item.description: Minimalist yet versatile, this black Zara sweater, made from 82% viscose and 18% polyamide, offers a sleek silhouette. Perfect for layering or wearing solo, this piece combines simplicity and sophistication.

item.name: Zara Cotton Yarn Sweater
item.description: Elevate your everyday look with this elegant sweater made from cotton yarn fabric. With a Perkins collar, a front zipper closure, and ribbed finishes, itâ€™s both stylish and functional. Crafted from 100% cotton, this piece is a versatile staple for your wardrobe.

item.name: Bershka Loose-Fit Beige Hoodie
item.description: Relax in style with this beige loose-fit hoodie from Bershka. Made with a mix of cotton and polyester, its soft touch and clean look make it the ultimate everyday essential. This is your go-to for casual comfort.

item.name: Uniqlo Grey Zip-Up Hoodie
item.description: Practical and stylish, this grey zip-up hoodie from Uniqlo is wearable for sizes L/M. Designed for ultimate comfort and versatility, itâ€™s perfect for layering or throwing on for a laid-back look.

item.name: Black T-Shirt
item.description: Keep it simple yet stylish with this black t-shirt from Bershka. Designed for comfort and versatility, it pairs effortlessly with any outfit.

item.name: Cream Playboy T-Shirt
item.description: Make a statement with this iconic white Playboy t-shirt featuring the signature HUF logo. Perfect for size EU M (wearable as L), this piece is a blend of comfort and trend.

item.name: Military-Green Regular Fit T-Shirt
item.description: Keep it earthy with this brown/green t-shirt by Playboy. Featuring a regular fit, this piece is ideal for casual, everyday wear.

item.name: Intimissimi White Cotton T-Shirt
item.description: Discover ultimate comfort with this Extrafine Superior Cotton T-Shirt by Intimissimi. Designed in a classic fit, this versatile piece is perfect for any casual or smart-casual outfit.

item.name: Black Graphic T-Shirt
item.description: Showcase your artistic side with Zara's black t-shirt featuring a vibrant, modern glasses print. This stylish, lightweight tee will make a trendy addition to your wardrobe.

item.name: Adidas Blue Branded T-Shirt
item.description: Stay sporty and cool in this iconic Adidas t-shirt with signature stripes and logo. Designed for an athletic or casual fit.

item.name: White Oversized T-Shirt
item.description: Keep it relaxed and casual with Bershkaâ€™s white oversize t-shirt. Perfect for layering or as a standalone piece.

item.name: Black Long-Sleeve T-Shirt
item.description: Tezenis delivers timeless style with this black long-sleeve t-shirt. Crafted for comfort and versatility, itâ€™s ideal for layering or a sleek, standalone look.

item.name: Amalfi Design T-Shirt
item.description: Celebrate coastal vibes with Zara's Amalfi design t-shirt, blending style and comfort. This piece features a creative print that adds flair to your casual wear.

item.name: Phoenix Suns Basketball T-Shirt
item.description: Cheer for your team with this Fruit of the Loom Phoenix Suns basketball t-shirt. Perfect for sports lovers, it offers a relaxed fit in size XL. A must-have for fans!

item.name: Start Lisbon T-Shirt
item.description: Embrace the entrepreneurial spirit with this Start Lisbon t-shirt. Featuring a stylish graphic, itâ€™s perfect for casual outings.

item.name: Red Santa T-Shirt
item.description: Add festive cheer to your wardrobe with this bright red Santa t-shirt. Perfect for the holiday season, this piece is ideal for spreading Christmas vibes.

item.name: "Take it Easy" Blue T-Shirt
item.description: Keep it cool and casual with this blue "Take It Easy" t-shirt. Perfect for laid-back days, this tee is your go-to for effortless style.

item.name: Bershka Cargo Pants
item.description: Effortless utility meets comfort with these Bershka cargo pants. Featuring a high-fit design, elastic waistband, and functional pockets, these pants are versatile enough for both casual and adventurous outings.

item.name: Zara Chino Straight Fit Pants
item.description: Refined yet relaxed, these Zara slim straight chinos offer a polished look for any occasion. Made for size EUR 40 (USA 31), they combine comfort and elegance, making them an essential wardrobe staple.

item.name: Zara Straight Fit Jeans
item.description: Bring a vintage vibe to your outfit with Zaraâ€™s straight-fit jeans, featuring a trendy washed effect. Comfortable and stylish, these jeans are made for size EUR 40 (USA 31).

item.name: Lonsdale Black Joggers
item.description: Elevate your athleisure game with these black jogger pants by Lonsdale, London. Featuring a sleek stripe detail and comfortable fit, they are perfect for casual days or workouts. Available in EU XS (wearable as S).

item.name: Bershka Grey Cargo Wide Fit Pants
item.description: Step into comfort with Bershka's wide cargo pants. Designed for a relaxed fit with ample pocket space, these grey pants are perfect for an urban, laid-back look.

item.name: Adidas Short Pants
item.description: Stay cool and active with these Adidas blue short pants, perfect for workouts or casual wear featuring a comfortable fit.

item.name: Pajama Set
item.description: Relax in style with this Yamamay pajama set. The soft and breathable fabric ensures ultimate comfort for a restful night. Available in size EU M/L, this set is a cozy must-have.
